alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 12:30AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Showers occurring along I-80 may cause slick driving conditions... Isolated to scattered rain showers are occurring across I-80 from Winnemucca to Wendover. A combination of radar and NDOT cameras are showing these showers and wet roadways. A mix of rain and snow showers may occur at the highest passes and summits along this stretch. These showers are moving to the east at 15-20 MPH. Travelers along I-80 should use caution due to wet and slick road conditions. Use reduced speed and low beams when necessary. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
